description: Change AgentSpeaker and VirtualAgentSpeaker color from green to blue to address user feedback about color confusion in call transcriptions

userStories.title: Update AgentSpeaker and VirtualAgentSpeaker color variant to blue
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to change the AgentSpeaker and VirtualAgentSpeaker color variant from 'green' to 'blue' in the speakers utility function so that agent speakers display with the correct color throughout the application.
acceptanceCriteria: In src/states/call/speakers/speakers.utility.ts line 49, change variant: 'green' to variant: 'blue' for AgentSpeaker
In src/states/call/speakers/speakers.utility.ts line 64, change variant: 'green' to variant: 'blue' for VirtualAgentSpeaker
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
